title: The piece of key thing for crafting (The new Mystery Box thing)
body:
How rare is it to get the stupid key?
Like, do we get it randomly once the game ends? Do I have to be in the post game queue?
Because recently, I've been getting connection timeout errors after every single game and I have to turn off without going into post game queue and have to then reconnect to play another.
It's a real struggle but yeah, this key thing seems to be a struggle
Got around 5 out of 20+ games

replies.body:
Hey man

As **Rengorax** stated before; the probability of a key drop after a win, will decrease based on how many keys you have already received. **Riot Wingfield** confirms this [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/rJ4rQmHA-after-getting-4-chests-key-fragments-no-longer-seem-to-drop-for-a-lot-of-people?comment=0006).

If you're looking to earn lots of keys, then I'd recommend playing in a pre-made party. This increases the chances of earning keys and shares chests earned among the party members.

[Here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)'s a useful link you might want to read on the Hextech Crafting system.
Just wondering, how much do pre-made ques increase the chance of earning keys?

There's no official announcement on this sadly. **Riot** has chosen to hold this data privately for now. However there was a guy on **Reddit** a few weeks ago collecting data on this.

You can find his post [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4atwfj/hextech_key_fragment_drop_rate_statistics/). 

According to his results there was a 5% increase in drop chance when in a 5 man pre-made. Fairly decent IMO. Remember this data is quite unreliable because of changing drop rates between people.

Wrong section man.
But as for keys, each time you get one they gradually increase in rarity, and you can only get one on a win. It takes me an average of 12 games to get a key.

Gotta be in a matchmaking game and win

Ive had 6 of them in about 8 games and had 2 boxes
